item.title: 美国就以色列无人机拦截事件对伊朗实施新制裁
item.description: 拜登政府就伊朗 4 月 13 日对以色列的袭击对伊朗实施了新的制裁，制裁对象是一家生产在袭击中发射的无人机所用发动机型号的公司。【原文：The Biden administration imposed fresh sanctions on Iran over its April 13 strike on Israel, targeting a company that made the engine type used in drones launched in the barrage.】

item.title: 阿尔诺称希望与中国在奢侈品问题上的紧张关系缓和下来
item.description: 亿万富翁贝尔纳-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）表示，他希望中国国家主席习近平下月对法国的访问将有助于巴黎与北京之间贸易关系的平稳发展。【原文：Billionaire Bernard Arnault said he hopes a planned visit to France next month by China’s Xi Jinping will help smooth trade relations between Paris and Beijing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特认为油价对通胀构成的风险较低
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）认为，与近年来大宗商品市场的剧烈波动相比，能源价格的飙升对欧洲通胀的威胁要小一些。【原文：A jump in energy prices would pose a less acute danger to inflation in Europe than the gyrations in commodities markets seen in recent years, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot.】

item.title: 首席执行官提出将 DNA 检测仪私有化计划，23andMe 公司股价大涨
item.description: DNA 检测公司 23andMe Holding Co. 首席执行官安妮-沃西基（Anne Wojcicki）表示，她正在考虑将这家陷入困境的公司私有化。【原文：DNA testing firm 23andMe Holding Co.’s shares soared after Chief Executive Officer Anne Wojcicki said she’s considering taking the struggling company private, less than three years after it began selling shares.】

item.title: 香水集团普依格与支持者将在马德里首次公开募股中筹资 26 亿欧元
item.description: Puig Brands SA 启动了 26 亿欧元（28 亿美元）的首次公开募股，这是今年迄今为止欧洲最大的首次公开募股，这家西班牙香水和化妆品公司试图利用该地区股票市场不断增长的势头。【原文：Puig Brands SA kicked off its €2.6 billion ($2.8 billion) initial public offering, the largest in Europe so far this year, as the Spanish fragrance and cosmetics company seeks to capitalize on growing momentum in the region’s equity markets.】

item.title: 美国要求对钢铁产品征收关税，中国誓言采取行动
item.description: 中国抨击美国对其钢铁和铝产品实施新限制的计划，表示将采取行动保护国家利益。【原文：China slammed a US plan to impose new restrictions on its steel and aluminum products, saying it will take action to protect the country’s interests.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称逐步取消燃料补贴对安哥拉 "至关重要
item.description: 国际货币基金组织敦促安哥拉继续逐步取消燃料补贴，即使去年部分取消燃料补贴导致了致命的抗议活动。【原文：The International Monetary Fund urged Angola to continue to gradually remove fuel subsidies even after a partial scrapping led to deadly protests last year.】

item.title: Sculptor 推出最新基金，购买风险最高的 CLO 切片
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Sculptor Capital Management 启动了一个平台，投资于风险最高的抵押贷款债务，其新所有者 Rithm Capital Corp. 将是该平台的主要投资者。【原文：Alternative asset manager Sculptor Capital Management has launched a platform to invest in the riskiest tranches of collateralized loan obligations, which will count its new owner Rithm Capital Corp. as a key investor.】

item.title: 沃尔特-诺埃尔是麦道夫最大的联接基金管理人，享年 93 岁
item.description: 沃尔特-诺埃尔（Walter Noel）去世了，他是与麦道夫（Bernie Madoff）合作投资的最大基金的管理者，并为其公司赚取了超过 10 亿美元的客户费。享年 93 岁。【原文：Walter Noel, who ran the the largest fund to invest with Bernie Madoff and made more than $1 billion in resulting client fees for his firm, has died. He was 93.】

item.title: 滞胀交易在 S&P 500 指数的痛苦之月中卷土重来
item.description: 在几乎所有股票基准和主题指数都走弱的这个月，滞胀交易显得尤为突出。【原文：The stagflation trade is standing out in a month where almost every stock benchmark and thematic index are weakening.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，若印度民调波动对股市造成冲击，则买入跌势
item.description: 摩根大通私人银行部门表示，投资者应利用印度大选期间印度股市的任何波动买入股票。【原文：Investors should use any swings in Indian stocks during the weekslong election as an opportunity to buy, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s private banking unit.】

item.title: DS Smith 的美国竞购者认为收购价值低于蒙迪报价
item.description: 国际纸业公司（International Paper Co.【原文：International Paper Co.’s all-stock offer to buy DS Smith Plc has taken a hit in value after the recent selloff in the US-based suitor’s shares, and is now worth less than an earlier proposal by rival bidder Mondi Plc.】

item.title: 债权人的背叛让 Invesco 在破产大战中与贝恩对峙
item.description: 马修-布鲁克斯难以置信地盯着屏幕上的数字。不知怎的，一大笔现金（约 9200 万美元）即将打入 Invesco 的账户。【原文：Matthew Brooks stared at the numbers glowing on his screen in disbelief. Somehow, a big slug of cash — some $92 million — was about to hit Invesco’s accounts.】

item.description:

item.title: 道明投资人会面，调查和首席执行官继任引发挫败感
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）准备与股东面对面，而此时投资者和高管们都在迫切希望美国调查可能带来的惩罚以及公司领导层的未来能够得到澄清。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank is poised to confront shareholders at a moment when investors and executives alike are clamoring for clarity on potential penalties in a US probe and the future of the firm’s leadership.】

item.title: Blackstone 的信贷和零售业务推动利润小幅增长
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 第一季度从大型零售基金和信贷策略中收取了更多费用，弥补了交易退出速度放缓的影响。【原文：Blackstone Inc. collected more fees from big retail funds and credit strategies during the first quarter, compensating for the slower pace of deal exits.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 预计欧洲央行将下令大幅缩减对俄罗斯的投资
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 表示，预计欧洲中央银行将下令大幅削减其在俄罗斯的业务，这可能会威胁到出售该部门的雄心。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG said it expects the European Central Bank to order a significant reduction of its Russian operations, potentially threatening ambitions to sell the unit.】

item.title: 温德霍斯特的 La Perla 公司停止支付员工工资，英国诉讼揭露真相
item.description: 陷入困境的德国金融家拉尔斯-温德霍斯特（Lars Windhorst）的奢侈内衣公司 La Perla 的一个部门去年年底停止向英国的两位董事支付工资，其中一位董事声称，没有收入给他们的生活造成了 "压力和灾难"。【原文：A unit of troubled German financier Lars Windhorst’s luxury lingerie firm La Perla stopped paying the salaries of two directors in the UK late last year, with one of them alleging that the lack of income had caused “stress and disaster” to their lives.】

item.title: 据称力拓和沙特阿拉伯将争夺第一量子矿业股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，力拓集团和沙特阿拉伯国家支持的马纳拉矿产投资公司（Manara Minerals Investment Co.【原文：Rio Tinto Group and Saudi Arabia’s state-backed Manara Minerals Investment Co. are among suitors considering bids for a stake in First Quantum Minerals Ltd.’s Zambian copper mines, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市在跌至二月份低点后趋于平静，美联储仍不急于降息。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stocks are calmer after a slide to February lows and the Fed remains in no rush to cut rates. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: Vanguard 警告 10 年期国债收益率有飙升至 5%的风险
item.description: 根据 Vanguard 的数据，国债市场正接近可能引发大规模抛售的水平，从而将 10 年期债券的收益率推回到 5%。【原文：The Treasury market is nearing levels that risk triggering a large selloff, pushing yields on 10-year bonds back to 5%, according to Vanguard.】

item.title: Foxtons 自英国脱欧以来最强劲的管道预示着房地产反弹
item.description: 伦敦房地产经纪公司Foxtons Group Plc的销售待售管道在第二季度初膨胀至2016年以来的最高水平，这进一步表明较低的借贷成本和强劲的工资增长正将之前犹豫不决的买家重新带回英国房地产市场。【原文：London estate agent Foxtons Group Plc’s sales under-offer pipeline swelled to the highest level since 2016 at the start of the second quarter, adding to signs lower borrowing costs and strong wage growth are bringing previously hesitant buyers back to the UK property market.】

item.title: 印尼要求国有企业避免购买美元
item.description: 印尼不鼓励其国有企业购买大量美元，这表明印尼采取了全力支持印尼盾的措施。【原文：Indonesia discouraged its state-owned enterprises from making huge dollar purchases, showing the all-hands-on-deck approach that the nation has taken to support the rupiah.】

item.title: 卢比债券三个月来涨幅最大，逢低买盘涌现
item.description: 由于投资者在本周早些时候的大跌后匆忙买入，印尼盾票据创下约三个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：Rupiah notes rallied the most in about three months as investors rushed to buy after the selloff earlier this week.】

item.title: 分析发现，没有证据表明英国央行的决策受大选影响
item.description: 根据新的分析，英国央行可能会在下一次英国大选前两次降息，该分析发现政治时间表并没有影响央行过去的决策。【原文：The Bank of England could cut interest rates twice before the next UK general election, according to new analysis that found the political timetable hasn’t influenced past decisions by the central bank.】

item.title: 德国央行称第一季度德国经济可能增长
item.description: 据德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）称，由于年初制造业回暖、出口增长和建筑业激增，欧洲最大的经济体德国经济将避免陷入冬季衰退。【原文：The German economy — Europe’s largest — is set to avoid a winter recession thanks to a pick-up in manufacturing, rising exports and surging construction at the start of the year, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 为什么巧克力世界面临危机？
item.description: 巧克力世界正面临着巨大的可可短缺，疯狂的交易吸引了一位不太可能的参与者：皮埃尔-安杜兰德（Pierre Andurand），一位以押注石油而闻名的对冲基金经理。【原文：The world of chocolate is facing such immense cocoa shortages that the wild trading lured an unlikely player: Pierre Andurand, a hedge-fund manager best known for his bets on oil.】

item.title: 马来西亚 RHB 银行将绿色贷款目标提高一倍至 100 亿美元
item.description: 马来西亚皇家银行（RHB Bank Bhd）将其绿色贷款目标提高了一倍多，到 2026 年达到 500 亿林吉特（105 亿美元）。【原文：RHB Bank Bhd. more than doubled its green loans target to 50 billion ringgit ($10.5 billion) by 2026 after the Malaysia lender surpassed its original target last year.】

item.title: EMMA Capital 旗下的 Premier Energy 计划在布加勒斯特首次公开募股，为公司发展提供资金支持
item.description: 罗马尼亚主要电力分销商之一 Premier Energy 计划在布加勒斯特证券交易所进行首次公开募股，以筹集约 1 亿欧元（1.07 亿美元）的资金，为扩张计划提供资金。【原文：Premier Energy, one of Romania’s leading power distributors, plans an initial public offering on the Bucharest Stock Exchange to raise about €100 million ($107 million) to finance expansion plans.】

item.title: 尽管价格创下新高，但可可价格因需求回升的迹象而攀升
item.description: 可可在纽约市场攀升，因为研磨数据表明，即使在价格飙升至创纪录的全球紧缩局面下，巧克力原料的需求仍在维持。【原文：Cocoa climbed in New York as grindings data suggested demand for the chocolate ingredient is holding up even as prices soared to a record amid a global crunch.】
